content: written pattern for miniature male and female mallard ducks advanced level materials needed 2 25 mm hook or hook size to match your yarn yarn needle stuffing pins and blocking mat/piece of cardboard black embroidery thread 1mm craft wire 2 inches per duck fabric glue i use hi-tack glue and wire are to make the beak these are recommended but optional an alternative crocheted beak pattern is also provided recommended yarn scheepjes catona yarn and colors must have this pattern assumes you know how to do the following stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half triple crochet triple crochet increase decrease slip_stitch working in back loops only changing colours all other stitches used are explained in the pattern how to use this pattern this pattern uses us terms and is worked in the round
